title: Remarkables 3
content:
Another rest day on the Sunday (no photos). There was a little bit of a town trip to grab some tasty food in the morning and lunch, then we hung out in the house playing Articulate for the afternoon.
We went to Coyote Mexican for dinner - quite good all around, with many of the group trying practically every hot sauce available!

The next day was another early one on the mountain, this time with the whole group. Weather started a little average, but came good through the day. I went up the Shadow basin chair for the first time after learning there were actually some intermediate runs up there (not all advanced / expert!) - this was a great choice, and proved to be a lot of fun!
5 of us had dinner at Tajâ€™s Indian restaurant - this was incredible in almost every possible way! The service was top notch, the food was spot on (amazingly tasty), and the drinks were some of the best on the trip. 100% recommend eating here!
